entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Kangirsuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:25 p.m. EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing this evening. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Blizzard. High zero.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the morning then snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
